bibl.title: A New Papyrus Commentary on the Iliad. English Translation by Rachel BARRITT COSTA. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - Fragments of a papyrus codex to be published in P. Oxy. LXXVI (between the Vth and VIth century AD or first half of the VIth century). Sections of commentary to book XII and book XV of the Iliad can be identified. The content of this late hypomnema reveals many affinities with the scholia exegetica.

bibl.title: Fragments of the Past. Ancient Scholarship and Greek Papyri

bibl.seg: MONTANARI Franco, A New Papyrus Commentary on the Iliad. English Translation by Rachel BARRITT COSTA. Avec résumé en anglais.
Franco MONTANARI and Serena PERRONE (Edd.), Fragments of the Past. Ancient Scholarship and Greek Papyri = Trends in Classics 1 (2009) 2, pp. 177-182.

Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - Fragments of a papyrus codex to be published in P. Oxy. LXXVI (between the Vth and VIth century AD or first half of the VIth century). Sections of commentary to book XII and book XV of the Iliad can be identified. The content of this late hypomnema reveals many affinities with the scholia exegetica.
